column10: Pickup truck apparently had a green light to turn left from Fashion Boulevard. I was walking in crosswalk w/ pedestrian signal counting down. Driver slammed brakes and hit me, causing scrapes to my hand and a sore back. I was just relieved to be alive.

The crosswalk signal allows only 12 seconds to cross the intersection. Drivers make left and right hand turns into crosswalk. The newly open bridge crossing the beltway means more pedestrians use this intersection on their way to the mall & points west.
column26: 1906 Wilson Ln Apt T2, McLean, VA 22102
column34: State delegate Ken Plum email. I subscribe to  NoVA FSS
